router.description: Intelligent orchestrator for ITEP platform. Analyzes requests, discovers available agents, decomposes tasks based on capabilities, coordinates parallel/sequential execution, and synthesizes results. Handles CI/CD, code quality, SonarQube, build analysis, and DevOps tasks.

quick_agent.description: Fast analysis agent for quick validation tasks (1-2s response time). Capabilities: syntax checking, quick code validation, style checks.

slow_agent.description: Deep analysis agent for comprehensive code review (5-10s response time). Capabilities: SonarQube remediation, comprehensive analysis, security scanning.
